summary:
Useful for laptop users with enb.
Runs ENB Injector and SKSE from steam with one click.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][color=yellow]Wanna proof? Here.[/color][/size]
[youtube]uKlDAoyCXz0[/youtube]


Hi~
This is for laptop users, who have trouble using wrapper version and are left with the injector one.
Simple app runs two exes. In our case we are going to use it as a special Skyrim launcher.
It runs ENB injector, then skse and shuts down itself.
You no longer have to manually launch enb. Good luck. :)[/center]

[color=green][size=5]Installation...[/size][/color]

1. Navigate to your skyrim root directory.
2. Rename ENBInjector.exe to [color=yellow]1.exe[/color] and skse_loader.exe to [color=yellow]2.exe[/color]
3. Backup your Skyrimlauncher.exe
4. Drop downloaded file to Skyrim root directory, replace if asked.




[url=https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/cfbe1a0838989a13a7b0fc21df35eb5fe4b916a1123e8a0aa04cce1beb599480/analysis/1445719186/]Virustotal[/url]

[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]

[url=http://enbdev.com/index_en.html]ENB[/url]
author: indexMemories
